00013   template <typename T>
00014   class DataInstanceReader;

00016 
00025 template <typename T>
00026 class dds::DataInstanceReader 
00027 {
00028 public:
00029   typedef typename dds::peer::DataReaderImpl<T>::DR   DR;
00030   typedef typename dds::peer::DataReaderImpl<T>::TSeq TSeq;
00031 
00032 
00033 public:
00034   DataInstanceReader(dds::peer::DataInstanceReader<T> reader, const T& key) 
00035     : reader_(reader),
00036       key_(key) 
00037   {
00038     handle_ = reader_->lookup_instance(key_);
00039   }
00040 
00041   ~DataInstanceReader() {}
00042 
00043 public:
00050   dds::ReturnCode_t read(TSeq& samples, dds::SampleInfoSeq& infos) {
00051     int rv = DDS::RETCODE_NO_DATA;
00052     if (handle_ == DDS::HANDLE_NIL)
00053       handle_ = reader_->lookup_instance(key_);
00054     
00055     if (handle_ != DDS::HANDLE_NIL)
00056       rv = reader_->read(samples,
00057                          infos,
00058                          DDS::LENGTH_UNLIMITED,
00059                          handle_,
00060                          DDS::NOT_READ_SAMPLE_STATE,
00061                          DDS::ANY_VIEW_STATE,
00062                          DDS::ALIVE_INSTANCE_STATE);
00063     return rv;
00064   }
00065 
00072   dds::ReturnCode_t take(TSeq& samples, dds::SampleInfoSeq& infos) {
00073     int rv = DDS::RETCODE_NO_DATA;;
00074     if (handle_ == DDS::HANDLE_NIL)
00075       handle_ = reader_->lookup_instance(key_);
00076 
00077     if (handle_ != DDS::HANDLE_NIL)
00078       rv = reader_->take_instance(samples,
00079                                   infos,
00080                                   DDS::LENGTH_UNLIMITED,
00081                                   handle_,
00082                                   DDS::NOT_READ_SAMPLE_STATE,
00083                                   DDS::ANY_VIEW_STATE,
00084                                   DDS::ALIVE_INSTANCE_STATE);
00085     return rv;
00086   }
00087   
00092   dds::ReturnCode_t read(TSeq& samples, 
00093                          long max_samples) {
00094     int rv = DDS::RETCODE_NO_DATA;;
00095 
00096     if (handle_ == DDS::HANDLE_NIL)
00097       handle_ = reader_->lookup_instance(key_);
00098       
00099     if (handle_ != DDS::HANDLE_NIL) {
00100       dds::SampleInfoSeq infos(max_samples);
00101       rv = reader_->read(samples,
00102                          infos,
00103                          max_samples,
00104                          handle_,
00105                          DDS::NOT_READ_SAMPLE_STATE,
00106                          DDS::ANY_VIEW_STATE,
00107                          DDS::ALIVE_INSTANCE_STATE);
00108     }
00109     return rv;
00110   }
00111   
00116   dds::ReturnCode_t take(TSeq& samples, 
00117                          long max_samples) {
00118 
00119     int rv = DDS::RETCODE_NO_DATA;;
00120 
00121     if (handle_ == DDS::HANDLE_NIL)
00122       handle_ = reader_->lookup_instance(key_);
00123 
00124     if (handle_ != DDS::HANDLE_NIL) {
00125       dds::SampleInfoSeq infos(max_samples);
00126       rv = reader_->take_instance(samples,
00127                                   infos,
00128                                   max_samples,
00129                                   handle_,
00130                                   DDS::NOT_READ_SAMPLE_STATE,
00131                                   DDS::ANY_VIEW_STATE,
00132                                   DDS::ALIVE_INSTANCE_STATE);
00133     }
00134     return rv;
00135   }
00140   dds::ReturnCode_t read(TSeq& samples, 
00141                          dds::SampleInfoSeq& infos,
00142                          long max_samples,
00143                          dds::SampleStateMask samples_state,
00144                          dds::ViewStateMask   views_state,
00145                          dds::InstanceStateMask instances_state) {
00146     int rv = DDS::RETCODE_NO_DATA;;
00147     if (handle_ == DDS::HANDLE_NIL)
00148       handle_ = reader_->lookup_instance(key_);
00149 
00150     if (handle_ != DDS::HANDLE_NIL)
00151       rv = reader_->read(samples,
00152                          infos,
00153                          max_samples,
00154                          handle_,
00155                          samples_state,
00156                          views_state,
00157                          instances_state);
00158     return rv;
00159 
00160   }
00161 
00166   dds::ReturnCode_t take(TSeq& samples, 
00167                          dds::SampleInfoSeq& infos,
00168                          long max_samples,
00169                          dds::SampleStateMask samples_state,
00170                          dds::ViewStateMask   views_state,
00171                          dds::InstanceStateMask instances_state) {
00172       
00173     int rv = DDS::RETCODE_NO_DATA;;
00174 
00175     if (handle_ == DDS::HANDLE_NIL)
00176       handle_ = reader_->lookup_instance(key_);
00177       
00178     if (handle_ != DDS::HANDLE_NIL) {
00179       rv = reader_->take_instance(samples,
00180                                   infos,
00181                                   max_samples,
00182                                   handle_,
00183                                   samples_state,
00184                                   views_state,
00185                                   instances_state);
00186     }
00187     return rv;
00188   }
00189   dds::ReturnCode_t return_loan(TSeq& samples, dds::SampleInfoSeq& infos) {
00190     return reader_->return_loan(samples, infos);
00191   }
00192   
00193 private:
00194   boost::shared_ptr<DR> reader_;
00195   T key_;
00196   dds::handle_t handle_;
